catalog_script_client.name: Set Duration

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_785da6852ff2201046c0af5df699b640
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Leave Request Input">9d8b6e052ff2201046c0af5df699b686</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Set Duration</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
	
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
    var start = g_form.getValue('start_date');
	var ga = new GlideAjax('lmsAjax');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getDateDiff');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_start', start);
	ga.addParam('sysparm_end', newValue);
	ga.getXML(getDuration);
	
	function getDuration(response)
	{
		var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		
		var days = (answer / (1000*60*60*24));
		var days1 = days + 1;
		g_form.setValue('duration', days1);
	}
	
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-03-08 11:27:54</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>785da6852ff2201046c0af5df699b640</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Duration</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Leave Management System" source="x_573698_lms">31afbb1c2f92201046c0af5df699b64e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Leave Management System">31afbb1c2f92201046c0af5df699b64e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_785da6852ff2201046c0af5df699b640</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-03-08 11:27:54</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
